name: ALCALDE & FAY (CITY OF DEERFIELD BEACH)
firms: CML CONSULTING SERVICES INC. (FORMERLY L.A. SKIP BAFALIS)
sampleDescriptions: Support for CDBG and HOME and additional flexibility for home maintenance and repair.
Seeking to delay or modify implementation of proposed waters of the U.S. rule.
Seeking support for Recreational Trail Grant, and for TIGER and INFRA programs.
Seeking to maintain tax free municipal bonds. Also, support for Marketplace Fairness Act.
